title: SAP Portfolio
description: Nexus helps enterprises through the complete business transformation of their standard SAP products, with tailored solutions and also achieving full system capacity and performance.

title: DevOps
description: As a technology and service leader for service providers, Nexus has developed the practice and talent to provide you with superb DevOps services.

title: Automation and Robotics
description: Excelacom provides end-to-end process automation, which involves different stages of human intervention. With improved artificial intelligence techniques, robots learn from errors and fine-tune the process to enhance efficiency.
